attr.title: Wuppo
attr.desc: Play as an exiled 'wum' looking for a new home in this bizarre but charming world, filled with strange creatures, puzzles, monsters and political chaos.
attr.inst: Install portfiles. Buy Wuppo on Steam. Right-click on Wuppo, select Properties, go to Betas, select 'Revert' (For MacOS version, make 'Revert' thick). Right-click on Wuppo again, go to Manage, then 'Browse Local Files.' Copy everything except the Funpack and Soundtrack folders. Go to your ROMs SD card, locate the 'ports/wuppo/assets' folder, and paste it there.
attr.inst_md:
1. Install portfiles. Buy Wuppo on Steam.
2. Right-click on Wuppo and select **Properties**.
3. Go to **Betas**, select **Beta Participation**, and choose **Revert** (For MacOS version, make **Revert** thick).
4. Right-click on Wuppo again, go to **Manage**, and select **Browse Local Files**.
5. Copy everything except for the **Funpack** and **Soundtrack** folders.
6. Go to your **ROMs SD card**, locate the `ports/wuppo/assets` folder, and paste the files there.
